alert.note: Alert for Garland; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 5:56PM CDT until October 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Garland County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Saline County in central Arkansas... West central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Hot Springs Village, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs Village... Paron... Grape... Bland... Crows... Owensville... Reform... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
